abstract.p: Rudrappa Sethi, a merchant based in a market (peth) in Solapur, states that in conjunction with the demolition and construction of a new market area, he agrees to transfer the office of market superintendent (sethiya) to the landlord (deshmukh) Hiroji along with small amounts of betel-nuts and oil and customs charges levied on the coming and going of gunny sacks.

div.p:
منکه رودرپه ولد ویرپه ستهه پتهه یک شنبه واقعه سولاپور صوبه خجسته بنیاد ام چون بهیروجی دیسموکهه
قلعه سولاپور را محضر نوشته میدهم که نزدیک دروازه تلجاپوری اهالی موالی و مهاجن قصبه وغیره
همه
اتفاق التزاق The word appears to be written التقاق here and in other related documents found in the same rumal. However, we have not found this word attested. On the basis of context, it is possible it is a misspelling of 'اتفاق', meaning 'agreeing', or, less likely, 'التزاق', meaning 'adhering.' شده پتهه نو اباد نمودند متصدیان پتهه یک شنبه آمده در سکنه نو اباد آمده سکونت
گرفتند بعدزان بنده و مهاناده نزد شما آمده کیفیت پتهه جانب خود را به عنوان ظاهر
نموده بایشان قرار کرده که اگر چه پتهه نو اباد که نزدیک دروازه است ايشان تلاش
نموده ویران سازند پتهه اینجانب را اباد نماید موافق شد امد دستور بازار شده باشد
وطن مهاجنکی پتهه مذکور خواهم داد قرار نموده ایشان بموجب اظهار انجانب بحاکم و
و مهاجنان قصبه را گفته پتهه نو اباد را ویران نموده پتهه یک شنبه اباد نمودند بنده
با اتفاق رعایاء انجا بحضور اهالی موالی آمده برضاء و رغبت وطن مهاجنکی
پتهه مذکور بشما نوشته داده شد

I am Rudrappa, son of Virappa Sethi of the Sunday peth occurring in Solapur in the suba Khujasta Bunyad [Aurangabad].
Whereas I am writing a mahzar to Hiroji Deshmukh of the Solapur fort: that near the Tuljapuri gateway all the people and the mahajans of the qasba, etc.
resolved adhering
together and appointed a newly constructed peth. The mutasaddis of the Sunday peth came and entering in the dwellings of the new construction, they
became content. Afterwards, the servant [Rudrappa] and the mahanad came to you and presented an account of their own peth in a clear manner,
and came to an agreement that although they have investigated the newly constructed peth that is near the gateway,
they shall demolish [it]. And the peth of this party [Rudrappa] should be populated. It is agreed [that] the income of the custom of the market [that] would have been,
I will give the patrimony of the mahajan rights of the aforementioned market. Presenting an agreement, they, on the basis of my statement, said to the hakim and
the mahajans of the town that the new construction should be demolished, and the Sunday peth should be constructed. The servant [Rudrappa],
by the consent of the subjects of that place, came into the presence of all the people and, with satisfaction and regard,
wrote to you [to give] the patrimony of the mahajan rights of the aforementioned market.

کما فصلت
عقب ستهه نام و سر و پاو
بروز بازار
فی دوکان تلی
۹ تانک
فی دوکان بقال ان یک سوپاری
فی گونی پنجروه منجمله یک روه

Particulars
the title of renowned sethi and robes of honour
On market days
9 tanaks [of oil] per oil shop 1 tanak is about 2 ounces.
one betel nut per provisions shop
Concerning the gunny-bags, out of every five rukas, one ruka

بدینموجب مان وغیره خورده وطن مهاجنکی را تا که افتاب و ماهتاب در دنیا قائم اند مینموده باشند سنه
۱۰۹۷ هجری
On the basis of enjoying [these] perquisites, etc., they shall be the patrimony of the mahajan rights as long as the sun and moon remain fixed in the world. The year 1097 Hijri.

सुरत हाल महजर पत्र राजश्री हिरोजी देसमुख कीले सो-
लापूर सां || मजकूर सुबे खोजस्त बुनीयाद यांस प्रती
रुद्रपा वलद वीरपा सेटी
व|| वस्ती
पेठ आदीतवार उरफ किले मजकूर
सन हजार १०९७ कारणे लिहून दिलहे महजरपत्र यैसाजे
क|| कसबा
मजकुरीचे हाकीमानी व माहजनानी तुलजापुरचे दर-
वाजा नजीक नवी पेठ वसीवीले आपली पेठ व बाजार मोडू-
न राहिले वरी आपण आपले पेठेचे माहनाड तुम्हापासी येऊन
आपले पेठेचे वर्तमान सांगोन तुम्हास करार केला कीं नवी
पेठ तुम्ही तलाश करून हाकीमास सांगोन सुदामद प्रमाणे
आपले पेठेचे बाजार करार हावें नवी पेठ मोडावें यैसें
केली यांनी तुम्हास आपले पेठेचे माहजनकी द्यावी यैसे
करार केले त्यास तुम्ही करार प्रमाणे हाकीमास सांगोन बहुत
तलाश करून तुम्ही नवी पेठ मोडून आपले पेठेचे बाजार
सुदामद प्रमाणें करार करून दिलहे त्यावरून आपण व
माहनाड हालीमवाली हजूर येऊन आपले रजावंदीने माहजन-
कीचे महजरपत्र वतन तुम्हास दीधले असे
तं|| तपसील

Statement in the form of a mahzar-patra to the honourable Hiroji Deshmukh of the fort
Solapur in the aforementioned sarkar in the suba Khujasta Bunyad [Aurangabad]
[from] Rudrappa, son of Virappa Sethi, resident in the Adityawar peth, or the aforementioned fort,
in the Hijri year 1097. Because a mahzar-patra is written as follows:
The hakims and mahajans of the aforementioned fort
settled a new peth near the Tuljapur gateway. They demolished and left my peth and market.
I [and] the mahanad of our peth came to you
and told you the news about my peth and agreed with you that
you should investigate the new peth, tell the hakims, and in an orderly fashion,
an agreement [about] the market of my new peth should take place, and the new peth should be demolished. In this matter it is
done. They should give the mahajan rights of our peth to you. In this matter,
an agreement is made. So you according to the agreement told the hakims, made great
investigations, demolished the new peth, and [for] my market in the peth
made an agreement in an orderly fashion. On that basis, I and
the mahanad and all the people presented ourselves and with [my] consent, gave
the mahzar-patra for the mahajan rights and the patrimony [therein] to you. So, the details:

सेठीया याचे नाव
पान सीरपाऊ
बाजाराचे दीवसी
दर दुकानास
तेली याचे दुकानास [अळी][अळी][अळी] ९
बकालाचे दुकानास सुपारी येक
गोणी दरा मद बरा-
मद होईल दर गोणी-
स रुके [अळी] ५ पैकी
येक रुका

The name of sethiya,
betel-leaf, robes
On market days,
from each store:
from the oil shops, [fractional symbol] [fractional symbol] [fractional symbol] 9
from the merchants' shops, one betel-nut
[Concerning] the gunny-bags that will come
and go, [from] each gunny-bag
out of every [fractional symbol] 5 rukas,
one ruka

येणेप्रमाणे मान माननूक खाऊन वतन महजनकीचे तुम्ही
लेंकराचे लेकरी सूर्य चंद्र असो जो परीयंत सुखे
असणें यासी काही नव दीगर गोष्टी करूं तरी आपणा-
सी श्रीसाक्षे असे हे लिहिले महजरपत्र सही
रुद्रपा सेठ लिहीले सहीThis line is written by a different, and perhaps Rudrappa Sethi's own, hand.

According to the foregoing, enjoy the fees and perquisites, and possession of the mahajan rights
you and the sons of your sons [under] the sun and the moon [shall enjoy]. So be it. As long as
you shall be happy, should anyone else raise an issue, I shall be
[beholden by] the witness of god. This mahzar-patra as written is approved.
Rudrappa Sethi [so] written approves.
